name: Simplest Fighting Game
description:
Tried to make a simple 2D fighting game within 48 hours and I'm kinda satisfied with the result! :)

<Key Instruction>

-1P-

A,D = move left, move right

W = jump

S = crouching

V = punch

B = kick

SPACE = dash

S, D, V = Shoryuken

-2P-

Left, Right = move left, move right

UP = jump

DOWN = crouching

Page Down = punch

End = kick

Delete = dash

Down, Left, Page Down = Shoryuken

<Basics of Fighting Mechanism>

'crouching' blocks 'punch'

'jump' dodges 'kick'

'crouching' reduces damage of 'shoryuken' to 1/10
